transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Vineet is talking.
Customer: Ji Vineet ji bolo.
Executive: Sir, I am saying that the image issue that was going on, that your image has been copied.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: We talked to them, so first they said that they will remove it, then they refused that we will not remove it. Plus, they have copied your photo and put their watermark on it.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Now sir, that photo cannot be removed by process.
Customer: Aap kab baat hui hai aapki?
Executive: Just now, just now.
Customer: Achcha kya keh diya unhone?
Executive: Ki hum nahi hatayenge photos.
Customer: Kyun nahi hatayenge?
Executive: Sir, now you, you should talk internally once and see, you were saying that they are your vendors, so it should be removed because now by process it cannot be removed because they copied, you are saying, but they have copied and put a watermark on it, so officially it has become their image.
Customer: Achcha aur jo hamari lagi hui thi?
Executive: You should put watermark on all your images which are already there. I would suggest you to do that first.
Customer: Laga hua hai sab pehle se already.
Executive: Haan toh jis pe jis pe watermark laga hai, wo koi nahi laga sakta. Aur unhone wo copy ki hui hai.
Customer: Yaar Vineet ji ek baat batao, ye toh seedhi seedhi si baat hai, jis pe watermark laga hai, us photo ko kyun nahi lagaega ya main hi kyun laga sakta?
Executive: Sir, now you also understand one thing, now I am removing it for you.
Customer: Pe naam likh diya ki Vineet. Use koi kaise use kar lega?
Executive: Sir, pehle ye tha ki pe Vineet likha gaya, use koi kaise use kar lega? Nahi, wo toh main maan raha hu.
Customer: Ab aap ye keh rahe ho.
Executive: Aap keh rahe ho ki aap aisi image do, aisi image toh koi bhi nahi hogi, meri kya kisi ki bhi nahi hogi.
Executive: Sir, ab batao phir kaise hataye wo nahi mana kar raha hai.
Customer: Aise koi thodi kar lega ki dhama se likha hua photo laga lega. Ab ab sir ko koi concern nahi tha. Mera concern ye tha ki unhone hamari image laga rakhi hai.
Executive: Ab ab wo laga toh rakhi hai lekin ab wo hatane se mana kar raha hai aur watermark hai us pe unka.
Customer: Watermark hai toh wo photo toh nahi hai unki.
Executive: Nahi hai sir wo kal ko claim agar suniye sir agar wo kal ko claim karne lage jo aapne photo lagai hai wo unki hai, phir kya karoge?
Customer: Are toh pehle phir kya karoge toh aap is aapke paas ye toh record hota hoga ki jo hai ki kisne upload kar rakhi hai photo aapne.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa aisa aisa sir koi aisa koi record nahi hai sir ki kisne lagai hai pehle ya baad mein. Image jo hoti hai hum log usi pe yahi consider karte hai.
Customer: Toh aapke liye ye matlab ye matlab aapke liye kal ko jo hai koi bhi jo hai koi TrustSeal le lega ya koi basic package le lega wo wo jyada premium ho gaya jo purane aapke customer hai wo nahi. Ye India ye IndiaMART pe nahi sir ya aap Bharat trade banwao Google pe promote karo kisi aur platform pe jao sabke liye aapka data koi kahin se copy kar sakta hai. Abhi main Google se jaake 50 image copy.
Customer: Chalo dekho abhi main doctor ke yaha aaya hu jo hai main abhi karunga aapse thodi der mein main thoda sa busy hu abhi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Abhi abhi
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's image was copied by another party.

- The other party added their watermark.

- The other party is refusing to remove the image.

- Concern about potential copyright claims.



Resolution:

- Executive stated the image cannot be removed.

- Executive suggested adding watermarks to all images.

- Executive stated there is no record of who uploaded first.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- image, watermark, copyright, vendors
